comments:

I'm using Eclipse 3.2, and have the following installed:
EMF SDK 2.1.2
Graphical editing framework sdk 3.1.1
J2EE Standard Tools 1.0.1
EMF model sdk 1.1.0.1
SDK for WST 1.0.1

Thank you in advance for your help.

I got it working by reinstalling eclipse and the WTP plugins, and starting with a clean (new) workspace. Mea culpa!  I had previously installed the plugins into a separate folder from eclipse. Now it's all together & it's working fine.
Thanks Janet, this one was starting to make my brain hurt!
